Package hr.fer.zemris.webapps.blog.servlets

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlogServlet
    Processes the requests for displaying blogs.
    IndexServlet
    Redirects to the main servlet.
    LoggedInFilter
    Sets the boolean flag in the request indicating if the user is logged in.
    LoginServlet
    Processes the login request.
    LogoutServlet
    Logs out the current logged in user.
    MainServlet
    Main servlet that displays the home page of the web-application containing login/register options and a list of all registered authors with links to their blogs.
    NewUserServlet
    Processes the request for registration of a new user.
    If the filled out RegistrationForm is without errors, the new BlogUser is created and stored, and if not the form is returned.
    RegistrationServlet
    Creates a new RegistrationForm and sends it to the user for filling out.
